column4: I just put an audio-cd in my cdrom on Hoary and it automaticly started the cdplayer and it all works well. But, should not gnome use a feature kind of like windows, where one gets to choose between "play, rip the cd, etc"?  It would be cooler, than as is now.
system -> preferences -> removable drives and media ?
i checked that one. It cant popup a dialog about what to do with the newly inserted medium. Like, play it, rip it etc.
no because the dialog box doesn't exist as far as I know, it can run any command you tell it to though... :-)
